This report, which focuses on Maternal and 
Perinatal Health Outcomes in Health Facilities, is 
one of five SMGL documents prepared by the 
Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) 
and by the Uganda and Zambia CDC country 
offices. The other documents are an Executive 
Summary and reports on the following topics: 
Monitoring and Evaluation Overview, Maternal 
Mortality,
